frontmatter.title: Improve work efficiency and reduce information loss by helping non-tech savvy users connect their email inbox to Digima.
frontmatter.synopsis: Despite the fact that over 1.7 million emails were sent monthly thought the application, leads replies were not registered, leading to inefficiencies and loss of valuable information for our users.

pageContext.title: Improve work efficiency and reduce information loss by helping non-tech savvy users connect their email inbox to Digima.
